member.name: Cash & Buck “Founders”
member.why:
The FIRST Immortal riders members of the month go out to the two guys who made this whole thing happen.
Cash and Buck brought the idea to life, pulled the right people together, and gave us something we can all stand behind.
Because of them, we all Stand together to build something we all believe in. Loyalty matters. Respect matters. Showing up matters. Your opinions and creativity matters.
We appreciate what you built, and we’re proud to ride under what you started, proud to stand together, proud to be a family.
highlights: Gave us a foundation that we’re all standing on today
Created a space where loyalty and brotherhood aren’t just words
member.quote: Its what YOU can do for the club.
